string-array.name: haunt_roll_types
string-array.item: \nOriginal Roll 6 dice. If result is less than omen card count, the haunt begins. Haunt may start early.
\nLegacy Roll dice equal to omen card count. If result is 6+, the haunt begins. Never haunt on first 2 rolls, but more likely to get haunt on 3rd or 4th roll.
\nUnofficial Roll dice equal to omen card count. If result is 7+, the haunt begins. Never haunt on first 3 rolls, otherwise roll probabilities similar to Original rules.
